titles.title: Modelling spreadsheets for stable isotope fractionation during diamond crystallization

descriptions.description: DiaRIF allows to model the effect of Ralyeigh isotope fractionation of carbon and nitrogen isotopes and N-content of diamond during precipitation from a fluid/melt containing a single carbon species. RIFMS allows to model Ralyeigh isotope fractionation in multi-component systems following Ray and Ramesh (2000). The modelled fluid contains two carbon species. d15N and N-content are calculated as in DiaRIF.
